001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithMetadata;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
005import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Contract;
006
007import java.io.Closeable;
008import java.io.IOException;
009
010@Contract
011public interface PersistentSubscriberErrorLog
012        extends Closeable {
013
014    public void init(PersistentSubscriberConfiguration configuration, PersistentSubscriber persistentSubscriber) throws IOException;
015
016    public void handle(WithMetadata<ArrayNode> arrayNodeWithMetadata, Throwable exception) throws IOException;
017}
